item.title: Outside 14-18 Keyes road, 29th November
item.description:
* H&S - Major trip hazards * Broken &raised paving stones Sunken paving stones collect rain water and leaves across whole width of pavement presenting h&S risk - particularly when it starts to freeze and you have no choice but to venture through it Please think of the impact this would have on the elderly and those with mobility / vision impairments

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Keyes Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
